funding-group.funding-statement: This study was funded by the Dutch AIDS Foundation (P-29702). Furthermore, JH was supported by the NWO Talent Scheme. Till BÃ¤rnighausen was supported by the Alexander von Humboldt Foundation through the Alexander von Humboldt Professor award, funded by the Federal Ministry of Education and Research; the Wellcome Trust; and from NICHD of NIH (R01-HD084233), NIA of NIH (P01-AG041710), NIAID of NIH (R01-AI124389 and R01-AI112339) as well as FIC of NIH (D43-TW009775). The funders of the study had no role in study design, data collection, data analysis, data interpretation, or writing of the report. The views expressed in this article are our own and not necessarily those of the funders.
